title: Star Citizen developer taking legal action over recent Escapist article
text:
Star Citizen developer taking legal action over recent Escapist article 
Published By: Lazygamer.net - Today 
The storm surrounding Star Citizen continues, as developers CIG and CEO Chris Roberts threaten legal action over a recent defamatory article...
